content: --ज --जात {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अंगात् जायते जन्-ड.] produced from or on the body, being in or on the body, bodily; °जं रजः, °जाः अलंकाराः &c. {2} produced by a supplementary rite. {3} beautiful, ornamental. (--जः) (--जनुस्) also {1} a son. {2} hair of the body ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also); तवोत्तरीयं करिचर्म सांगजं <ls>Ki. 18. 32.</ls> {3} love, cupid (अंगं मनः तस्माज्जातः); intoxicating passion; अंगजरागदीपनात् <ls>Dk. 161.</ls> {4} drunkenness, intoxication. {5} a disease. (--जा a daughter. (--जं blood.
